snippet.title: Power at Sea - C64 - (1987) - Accolade - Distinctive Software - C64 games - WW II - Leyte Gulf
snippet.description:
Power at Sea deals with the battle for Leyte Gulf in World War 2. It's October 1944 and, as the commander of an American fleet consisting of three ships, you have the task of taking control of Leyte Gulf within 96 hours and freeing it from the Japanese. To do this, you'll have to capture a total of four enemy bases.

Enjoy old games on 8-bit, 16-bit or 32-bit machines? Then check out our Youtube channel for more videos to subscribe. 

Interested in retro gaming podcasts. give it a try on www.legendarygam.es - all episodes are free to listen to. :-)

#accolade #c64games #c64
